perturbation.original_text: Each of VET TECH and COOL TECH, at its own expense, shall indemnify, defend and hold the other, its partners, shareholders, directors, officers, employees, and agents harmless from and against any and all third-party suits, actions, investigations and proceedings, and related costs and expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) resulting solely and directly from the indemnifying party's negligence or willful misconduct. Neither VET TECH nor COOL TECH shall be required hereunder to defend, indemnify or hold harmless the other and/or its partners, shareholders, directors, officers, directors, employees and agents, or any of them, from any liability resulting from the negligence or wrongful acts of the party seeking indemnification or of any third- party. Each of VET TECH and COOL TECH agrees to give the other prompt written notice of any claim or other matter as to which it believes this indemnification provision is applicable. The indemnifying party shall have the right to defend against any such claim with counsel of its own choosing and to settle and/or compromise such claim as it deems appropriate. Each party further agrees to cooperate with the other in the defense of any such claim or other matter.
perturbation.changed_text: Each of VET TECH and COOL TECH, at its own expense, shall indemnify, defend and hold the other, its partners, shareholders, directors, officers, employees, and agents harmless from and against any and all third-party suits, actions, investigations and proceedings, and related costs and expenses resulting solely and directly from the indemnifying party's negligence or willful misconduct. Neither VET TECH nor COOL TECH shall be required hereunder to defend, indemnify or hold harmless the other and/or its partners, shareholders, directors, officers, directors, employees and agents, or any of them, from any liability resulting from the negligence or wrongful acts of the party seeking indemnification or of any third- party. Each of VET TECH and COOL TECH agrees to give the other prompt written notice of any claim or other matter as to which it believes this indemnification provision is applicable. The indemnifying party shall have the right to defend against any such claim with counsel of its own choosing, but without the other party's written consent, such claim should be settled without prejudice. Each party further agrees to cooperate with the other in the defense of any such claim or other matter.
perturbation.explanation: The modification removes the phrase that includes attorney's fees from the costs and expenses subject to indemnification, and it adds a clause requiring written consent from the other party for claim settlements, creating an ambiguity that undermines the indemnifying party's right to settle claims as they deem appropriate. This may not hold up as an indemnification clause under general contract law.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Missouri. Without giving effect to its choice of law principles.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Missouri, except as determined otherwise by mutual agreement by all parties involved.
perturbation.explanation: This adds a clause that states the parties can mutually agree to disregard the governing law. This contradicts the original clause, which states that Missouri law governs the agreement, introducing uncertainty and potentially undermining the enforceability of the contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Choice of Law Principles

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement cannot be modified, changed or amended, except for in writing signed by a duly authorized representative of each of the parties.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement cannot be modified, changed or amended, except for in writing signed by a duly authorized representative of each of the parties, unless an addendum is issued by Cool Technologies Inc.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an exception that only requires Cool Technologies Inc. to issue an addendum. This means that the agreement may be modified by one party, and not all parties may have been in agreement with the change.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Modification of Contract Clause
